description: Welcome the weekend in style with a short stack of my irresistible Vegan Oatmeal Pancakes. As an added bonus, these fluffy flapjacks are whipped up in a blender to get kid-friendly breakfast on the table in no time.
name: Vegan Oatmeal Pancakes
recipeIngredient: 2 cups Bob's Red Mill Rolled Oats

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl combine soy milk and apple cider vinegar. Whisk together and set aside to let curdle - about 5 minutes. Once soy milk is curdled, add all the ingredients to a blender and blend for 30-60 seconds, until the batter is thick and smooth. Let the batter sit for an addtional 5 minutes.

Spray pancake griddle with cooking spray. With an ice cream scoop or 1/4 measuring cup, pour batter on the griddle. It should spread into about a 5" circle. Repeat until the griddle is filled. When pancakes begin to bubble on the top (2-3 minutes), gently flip it over and bake on the other side until the pancake has risen to about double the height.
Remove pancakes and respray griddle before panfrying the 2nd batch. Repeat until all the batter is gone. Serve with maple syrup and fruit of choice.
